title: #ResourceBlock.v1_0_0.ResourceBlock

enumDescriptions.Composing: Intermediate state indicating composition is in progress.
enumDescriptions.Composed: Final successful state of a Resource Block which has participated in composition.
enumDescriptions.Unused: Indicates the Resource Block is free and can participate in composition.
enumDescriptions.Failed: The final composition resulted in failure and manual intervention is required to fix it.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Reserved.description: This represents if the Resource Block is reserved by any client.
Reserved.longDescription: This property shall be a boolean that is set by client once the Resource Block is identified to be composed.  It shall provide multiple clients a way to negotiate its ownership.  This will help clients to know if a Resource Block is reserved by other client.

CompositionState.description: This property represents the current state of the Resource Block from a composition perspective.
CompositionState.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an enumerated value describing composition state of the Resource Block.

CompositionStatus.description: Composition status of the Resource Block.
CompositionStatus.longDescription: This type shall contain properties that describe the high level composition status of the Resource Block.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

CompositionStatus.description: This property describes the composition status details for this Resource Block.
CompositionStatus.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain composition status information about this Resource Block.

ResourceBlockType.description: This property represents the types of resources available on this Resource Block.
ResourceBlockType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of enumerated values describing type of resources available.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

ComputerSystems.description: An array of references to the Computer Systems that are composed from this Resource Block.
ComputerSystems.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type ComputerSystem that represent the Computer Systems composed from this Resource Block.

Chassis.description: An array of references to the Chassis in which this Resource Block is contained.
Chassis.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type Chassis that represent the physical container associated with this Resource Block.

Zones.description: An array of references to the Zones in which this Resource Block is bound.
Zones.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type Zone that represent the binding constraints associated with this Resource Block.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: The Links property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

Oem.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Processors.description: An array of references to the Processors available in this Resource Block.
Processors.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type Processor that are in this Resource Block.

Memory.description: An array of references to the Memory available in this Resource Block.
Memory.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type Memory that are in this Resource Block.

Storage.description: An array of references to the Storage available in this Resource Block.
Storage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type Storage that are in this Resource Block.

SimpleStorage.description: An array of references to the Simple Storage available in this Resource Block.
SimpleStorage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type SimpleStorage that are in this Resource Block.

EthernetInterfaces.description: An array of references to the Ethernet Interfaces available in this Resource Block.
EthernetInterfaces.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type EthernetInterface that are in this Resource Block.

NetworkInterfaces.description: An array of references to the Network Interfaces available in this Resource Block.
NetworkInterfaces.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type NetworkInterface that are in this Resource Block.

ComputerSystems.description: An array of references to the Computer Systems available in this Resource Block.
ComputerSystems.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of references of type ComputerSystem that are in this Resource Block.

ResourceBlock.description: This schema defines a Resource Block resource.
ResourceBlock.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a Resource Block for a Redfish implementation.

enumDescriptions.Compute: This Resource Block contains both Processor and Memory resources in a manner that creates a compute complex.
enumDescriptions.Processor: This Resource Block contains Processor resources.
enumDescriptions.Memory: This Resource Block contains Memory resources.
enumDescriptions.Network: This Resource Block contains Network resources, such as Ethernet Interfaces.
enumDescriptions.Storage: This Resource Block contains Storage resources, such as Storage and Simple Storage.
enumDescriptions.ComputerSystem: This Resource Block contains ComputerSystem resources.
